Package cryptoTrader.controllers.brokerController

Class BrokerController

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.controllers.brokerController.BrokerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
RequestBrokerUpdate
public class BrokerController extends Object implements RequestBrokerUpdate
This class is coded to link BrokerModel and BrokerTableView classes in Controller system.
Author:
Yakup Tezcan, Wesley James Fortin, Reginald Pierre Harder, TSUNG-YING TSAI This class implements RequestBrokerUpdate class as an interface.

    • requestBrokerEdit

      public void requestBrokerEdit​(int index, String name, String coins, String strategy)
      This method takes the request of editing an information about an existing broker.
      Specified by:
      requestBrokerEdit in interface RequestBrokerUpdate
      Parameters:
      index - , the index of the broker to edit in the table.
      name - , the name of the broker to edit in the table.
      coins - , the name of the coins to edit in the table.
      strategy - , the name of the trading strategy to edit in the table. This method overrides the requestBrokerEdit method in RequestBrokerUpdate interface.
